about_the_game:
Welcome to Endless Machines, a vast and ever-changing world—reclaimed by nature and maintained by robots, from lush forests and windswept plains to arctic tundra and fuming swamps.

Far into the future, eight robots, once built for war and destruction, awaken and must now adapt to a world far removed from their original purpose. Discarded and forgotten, they set out to piece together the fragments of their past and in search of their creators: Why were they abandoned?

Beneath the surface lies a maze of tunnels born from sunken cities, filled with the crumbling echoes of a forgotten past and traces of humanity’s history waiting to be uncovered.

On the surface, rogue robots roam freely, leaving destruction in their path. Ancient war machines—powerful, relentless—guard their territories, threatening the fragile balance of this world. Confronting them is not only a test of skill but a journey into the darker corners of our hero robots' past.

A journey through a vibrant yet lonely world, that belongs to those who adapt, where every trace you leave becomes part of the story.

Wishlist now and prepare to awaken!

A Living World

  • Experience a richly detailed and carefully crafted open-world ARPG, where eight unique biomes come to life, with dynamic seasons, day and night cycles, weather patterns, and NPC behaviors that create a vibrant and realistic environment. A world teeming with life, both organic and mechanical: over 350 species of plants, flowers, trees, birds, insects, and animals, and nearly 1 million non-deterministic simulated NPC robots. Tireless robots maintain their specific task in the ecosystem, supported by scanning drones that react to even the smallest disturbances and summon guards to indiscriminately enforce order, all under the guidance of the mysterious biome overseers, the Conductor.

Forge your path

  • Your actions shape the world. Whether you engage as a creator or a destroyer, the world responds dynamically, evolving with each choice you make. Destroy the Conductors, and your version of this intricate ecosystem will descend into a scorched, endless war. Defeat the Wardens and watch the landscape heal.

Eight Robots, One Mission

  • Katame, Egal, Dura, Geweier, Joule, Shui, Velos, and Ares - each have their own unique abilities and personalities. As you progress and uncover each sibling, you get to harness each hero's unique skills.

A Guiding Light

  • Wherever you go, B.O.B., your robot's spirit animal, will follow. Or lead. Throughout the journey, B.O.B. takes on different forms and will prove an invaluable companion. B.O.B. can even be fitted with unique skills and features as you progress.

Battles To Be Won

  • Battle rogue robots, malfunctioning androids, and face off against the sinister and powerful Wardens in great boss battles.

Explore the Past

  • Venture into a network of subterranean ruins—artistically crafted and procedurally generated in-game—filled with danger and the invaluable microplastic spores

Upgrade and design your robots

  • Collect microplastic spores the core resource of this world. Use it to upgrade and customize your weapons, scavenge for unique cosmetics, experiment with stat tune kits and install rare-to-find skills and add them to your robot's OS.

Navigate the Underground

  • Travel the world via a vast interconnected metro system connecting the eight biomes in real time. Remember your ticket, or test your skills by going guns blazing against the guard drones.

movies.name: Troublemaker with a mortar (No witnesses, no crime).
Can't believe you did that, man.

name: Endless Machines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Winows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 17 10th gen / AMD Ryzen 9 5950x
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: Search for your past and forge your future—as a creator or destroyer—a lonely robot on a journey of exploration, self-discovery, danger, wonders and unexpected revelations, in this richly detailed and carefully crafted isometric, open-world ARPG.
